channel.title: Comments on: Welcome a new White

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Guys, thanks for your messages - I am overwhelmed at how wonderful Elspeth is. She is our miracle - our rose flowering at midnight (to borrow from Douglas Coupland). She has her mother's nose...which is a relief! I was so proud when Jen, Trev, Mum and Dad saw her and I look forward to her becoming friends with Aunts, Uncles, Best Men and all our friends!</p>
item.content:encoded: Guys, thanks for your messages – I am overwhelmed at how wonderful Elspeth is. She is our miracle – our rose flowering at midnight (to borrow from Douglas Coupland). She has her mother’s nose…which is a relief! I was so proud when Jen, Trev, Mum and Dad saw her and I look forward to her becoming friends with Aunts, Uncles, Best Men and all our friends!

item.title: By: Kieran
item.dc:creator: Kieran
item.description: <p>Have just heard the wonderful news! Congratulations<br/><br/>Matthew and all the family. You must all be so proud. <br/><br/>I look forward to meeting the latest member of the White<br/><br/>family soon!<br/><br/><br/><br/>Kieran<img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJG/$FILE/cheesy.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded:
Have just heard the wonderful news! Congratulations

Matthew and all the family. You must all be so proud.

I look forward to meeting the latest member of the White

family soon!

Kieranhttp://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJG/$FILE/cheesy.gif“>

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>yey I'm an aunt to a baby girl, congrats to Si & fi and their new born child, glad your all well and we look forward to seeing you soon. <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJV/$FILE/laugh.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded: yey I’m an aunt to a baby girl, congrats to Si & fi and their new born child, glad your all well and we look forward to seeing you soon. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJV/$FILE/laugh.gif“>
